name: The Creature's Drones
description:
Some drones escaped from the local Big Huge Mega Corporation™

Grab your belongings before they do and drive away!

Made for the Duel Game Jam

Duel Partner: Kordesii (click here to check out their game)

Themes we chose:  "60 seconds" + "You're doing that genre wrong" + "MS Paint  art"

WARNING: current build is pretty broken (missing sound effects, lag spikes, no settings menu), and ik, lackluster description, but it's almost 6 AM and i have to submit the game to the jam in under 3 hours as i am writing this, and I am too dead tired to be bothered to fix anything XD
